CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( DS_CPO_Validity_Check__c ,'Green'),NOT(ISPICKVAL( Contract_Type_Name__c,'Project'))),HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=CPO Download&mode=touchless&outputType=None', IMAGE("/resource/CPO_Download","CPO Download"),"_self"),null)
CustomField.label: CPO Download
